title: What about a Lux skin?
body:
So I made it by myself ^^ {{champion:99}} 

Her Q: She si blow or sing into the michrophone and a sparkle voice wave eill capture the enemy.

Her W: She throw away her wnad and the allies will got a barrier what will sparkle or lightning.

Her E: Ther will be two speaker and they begin to falling to pieces and the will ecplode and there will be sound waves.

Her Ult as  imagine that: She will sing into the microphone and there will be a large voice wave with some sparkling and the ground will damage below of it.

I hope Riot will get a feel to make this ^^

I hope too the summoners will like it too ^^

replies.body:
Akkor a neve lehetne már inkább Popstar Lux, hogy kapcsolódjon esetleg Ahrihoz. :)
So her name should be Popstar Lux, so there could be a connect to Ahri.
